item.title: 贝恩资本拟对FineToday发起具有约束力的收购要约，瞄准亚洲美容市场
item.description: 知情人士透露，贝恩资本已对日本个人护理集团FineToday Holdings Co.提出具有约束力的收购要约。这家全球私募股权公司正寻求利用该公司在包括中国在内的关键亚洲市场的业务布局。【原文：Bain Capital has made a binding offer for Japanese personal-care group FineToday Holdings Co., according to people familiar with the matter, as the global buyout firm seeks to capitalize on the business’s footprint in key Asian markets including China.】

item.title: 台美贸易协议有望提振经济增长，但可能拖累货币汇率
item.description: 巴克莱银行上调了对台湾经济增长的预测，此前这个亚洲科技强国与美国达成贸易协议。不过该行与其他预测机构一样，认为台湾货币中期将面临一定下行压力。【原文：Barclays Plc raised its forecast for Taiwan’s growth after the Asian tech powerhouse reached a trade deal with the US, though the bank joined other forecasters in seeing some downward pressure on the currency over the medium-term.】

item.title: 塔塔瞄准6000辆电动巴士订单，拒绝加入价格战
item.description: 塔塔汽车公司正准备竞标政府采购的6000辆电动巴士项目。该公司高管表示，此举旨在夺回市场份额，同时避免参与近期竞标中普遍存在的深度折扣竞争。【原文：Tata Motors Ltd. is preparing to bid for a government tender of as many as 6,000 electric buses, as it seeks to claw back market share without joining the steep discounting that has defined recent auctions, its top official said.】

item.title: 中国经济三大支柱显示增长分化加剧
item.description: 中国消费敏感型行业的发展速度正进一步落后于制造业和科技相关产业，这凸显出该国经济日益依赖外部需求所导致的显著分化。【原文：China’s consumer-sensitive sectors are lagging further behind growth in industries linked to manufacturing and tech, illustrating a sharp divide in an economy increasingly exposed to foreign demand.】

item.title: Meta亚洲政策主管因监管挑战加剧即将离职
item.description: Meta Platforms公司正面临亚太地区及全球多项监管挑战之际，其亚太区最高级公共政策主管即将离职。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is losing its most senior public policy executive in the Asia-Pacific at a time when the company faces several regulatory challenges in the region and beyond.】

item.title: 马斯克询问是否该收购瑞安航空，因与首席执行官的争执持续升级
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克与瑞安航空控股公司的网络争执已持续至第二周，这位全球首富在与该公司首席执行官交锋后，再度抛出收购该航空公司的构想。【原文：The online brawl between Elon Musk and Ryanair Holdings Plc dragged into a second week, with the world’s richest man again floating the idea of buying the airline after clashing with its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 日本债券暴跌凸显政策挑战，策略师称
item.description: 日本国债市场出现崩盘，40年期国债收益率首次突破4%的历史纪录，部分分析师认为这可能迫使日本央行加快加息步伐。【原文：A meltdown in Japanese sovereign bonds, with yields on 40-year debt surging past 4% for the first time on record, may pile pressure on the Bank of Japan to act quicker to raise rates, according to some analysts.】

item.title: 东盟股市有望迎来2024年以来首次连续外资流入
item.description: 东南亚新兴市场股票有望实现近16个月来首次连续两个月吸引外资流入，这标志着在持续资金外流之后，投资者兴趣正在复苏。【原文：Southeast Asia’s emerging-market stocks are poised for their first back-to-back monthly foreign inflows in nearly 16 months, signaling a revival of investor appetite after prolonged outflows.】

item.title: 印度地产开发商K·拉赫贾拟筹资7亿美元进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度最大房地产开发商之一K Raheja Corp Pvt.正考虑进行首次公开募股，预计融资规模可达7亿美元，这可能为该国房地产行业最大规模的上市交易之一奠定基础。【原文：K Raheja Corp Pvt., one of India’s largest real estate developers, is weighing an initial public offering that could raise as much as $700 million, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially setting the stage for one of the country’s biggest listings in the industry.】

item.title: CSG所有者斯特纳德寻求在阿姆斯特丹IPO募资25.5亿欧元
item.description: 33岁的米哈尔·斯特拉纳德作为捷克斯洛伐克集团AS的拥有者，正寻求通过这场创纪录的最大规模国防类首次公开募股筹集25.5亿欧元（约合29.8亿美元）。【原文：Michal Strnad, the 33-year-old owner of Czechoslovak Group AS, is seeking to raise €2.55 billion ($2.98 billion) from what is set to be the largest defense initial public offering on record.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克以22亿美元收购Rapt Therapeutics
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司同意以22亿美元收购美国生物技术公司Rapt Therapeutics，该公司专注于为炎症和免疫系统疾病患者开发治疗方案。【原文：GSK Plc agreed to buy Rapt Therapeutics, a US-based biotech developing treatments for patients with inflammatory and immunologic diseases, in a deal valued at $2.2 billion.】

item.title: 意大利财政部据称支持洛瓦廖连任意大利西恩纳银行新任期
item.description: 据知情人士透露，意大利财政部支持西恩纳蒙特帕斯基银行首席执行官路易吉·洛瓦廖连任该职位。【原文：Italy’s Finance Ministry is backing Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA Chief Executive Officer Luigi Lovaglio for a new term in the role, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国失业率维持在近五年高位，就业市场趋冷
item.description: 英国工资增速创下三年半以来最低水平，雇主持续裁减岗位，这些迹象表明就业市场持续疲软，而英国央行正考虑还能进一步降息多少。【原文：UK wages grew at their slowest pace in 3 1/2 years and employers continued to trim jobs, more signs of a weakening jobs market as the Bank of England considers how much further it can cut interest rates.】

item.title: 达沃斯论坛前民调显示：全球企业倚重人工智能与并购实现增长
item.description: 根据安永-帕瑟农的一项调查，全球商业领袖正依靠新技术和收购来推动增长，以应对紧张的经济形势。【原文：Global business leaders are relying on new technologies and acquisitions to drive growth against a tense economic backdrop, according to an EY-Parthenon survey.】

item.title: 英国薪资增长略有放缓，失业率维持在5.1%
中国廉价委内瑞拉原油即将告罄，最后一艘油轮驶向东方
item.description: 运载受制裁委内瑞拉原油前往亚洲的最后一批油轮将于近日抵达，这标志着中国获取廉价石油的便捷渠道即将终结——该渠道曾长期支撑着中国炼油业的发展。【原文：The last tankers carrying sanctioned Venezuelan crude to Asia are set to arrive in the coming days, effectively drawing to a close China’s easy access to a source of cheap oil that has helped sustain its refining sector.】

item.title: 啤酒价格翻倍凸显英国酒吧经营困境
item.description: 为英国酒吧举杯致哀：它们被不断上涨的税费压得喘不过气，被年轻的禁酒者们冷落，如今又不得不与超市竞争——后者如今能以比以往更低廉的价格压制它们。【原文：Pour one out for British pubs: squeezed by rising taxes, neglected by young teetotalers, and now, competing with supermarkets able to undercut their prices more steeply than before.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦计划时隔四年重返全球债券市场
item.description: 巴基斯坦计划时隔四年重返全球债券市场，彰显其在经济稳定方面取得的进展——而就在几年前，该国还曾濒临违约边缘。【原文：Pakistan plans to return to the global bond market after four years, underscoring its progress in economic stabilization after coming close to a default just a few years ago.】

item.title: TCV与黑石集团以42.5亿美元估值支持初创企业Pennylane
item.description: 法国初创企业Pennylane近日完成1.75亿欧元（约合2.04亿美元）融资，本轮融资由成长型股权投资机构TCV领投。该公司主营会计软件业务。【原文：Pennylane, a French startup that sells accounting software, has raised €175 million ($204 million) in a funding round led by growth equity investor TCV.】

item.title: 中国推出贷款激励措施以提振投资和消费
item.description: 中国宣布了一系列激励措施以刺激投资和消费，包括设立5000亿元人民币（720亿美元）的贷款担保机制，鼓励民营企业借贷扩大经营。【原文：China has announced a slew of incentives to spur investment and consumption, including a 500 billion-yuan ($72 billion) loan guarantee facility to encourage private companies to borrow for expansion.】

item.title: 格陵兰岛在《风险》游戏中并不像看起来那么大
item.description:
欧洲有能力迫使资本流动达成混乱的妥协，而非动用军队。【原文：

Europe has it in its power to force a messy compromise with capital flows, not troops.

】

item.title: 中英两国设立网络攻击论坛以降低紧张局势
item.description: 在两国关系因一系列黑客指控而恶化之后，英中两国安全官员建立了一个论坛，以讨论网络攻击问题。【原文：British and Chinese security officials established a forum to discuss cyberattacks following a spate of hacking accusations that soured relations between the two countries.】

item.title: 安联全球投资为新混合融资基金筹集6.9亿美元
item.description: 安联全球投资者公司已为新推出的基金筹集6.9亿美元资本，该基金旨在整合私募与公募资本用于气候项目。【原文：Allianz Global Investors has secured $690 million in capital for a newly launched fund designed to combine private and public capital for climate initiatives.】

item.title: 韩国股市史诗级反弹面临芯片依赖与做空压力
item.description: 韩国Kospi指数在5000点关口前停滞不前，暴露了市场深层的疲态：散户投资者持续保持警惕，而指数涨幅仅依赖于少数几只个股。【原文：The South Korean Kospi Index’s stall shy of the 5,000 milestone reveals strains beneath the surface, as retail investors stay wary and gains hinge on just a handful of stocks.】

item.title: 中美科技竞争加剧，中国考虑设立科技创新并购基金
item.description: 中国正全力争夺从机器人到人工智能等前沿技术的领导权，随着北京方面加大推动技术突破的力度，中国正在研究是否设立国家并购基金。【原文：China, locked in a battle to lead technologies ranging from robotics to artificial intelligence, is studying whether to set up a national mergers and acquisition fund as Beijing ramps up its push for technological breakthroughs.】

item.title: 中国通过重启加拿大油菜籽进口确保油籽供应充足
item.description: 中国通过放宽对加拿大油菜籽的进口限制，已全面开放所有主要油籽进口渠道，从而为其庞大的畜牧业提供了充足的饲料供应。【原文：China has unblocked all major channels for oilseed imports by easing restrictions on Canadian canola, boosting supplies of feed for its vast numbers of livestock.】

item.title: 中国电力股因人工智能需求激增及投资推动而大涨
item.description: 2026年初，中国电力股正受到投资者青睐，这得益于全球对电力设备需求的激增——这些设备用于建设人工智能数据中心，同时政府主导的投资推动也为该领域注入了动力。【原文：Chinese electric stocks are winning favor with investors early in 2026, thanks to intensifying global demand for power gear to build data centers for artificial intelligence as well as a state-led investment push in the sector.】

item.title: 贝莱德获准将亚洲信贷基金再延长一年
item.description: 贝莱德公司已获得投资者同意，将旗下第二只亚洲私募信贷基金的投资期限延长，此举标志着该公司在应对亚洲私募市场挑战方面取得进展。【原文：BlackRock Inc. has obtained investor consent to extend the investment period of its second Asia private credit fund, a step forward as it navigates challenges in the region’s private markets.】

item.title: 印度在三年禁令后允许部分小麦产品出口
item.description: 印度批准出口部分小麦制品，放宽了实施三年多的限制措施。此举源于市场预期今年小麦丰收将大幅增加国内供应。【原文：India approved the export of some wheat-based goods, easing restrictions that have been in place for more than three years, on expectations for a strong harvest that will likely boost domestic supplies.】

item.title: 新加坡小型股将因市场改革提振而反弹
item.description: 分析师指出，在本地市场改革的支持下，新加坡中小型股或将迎来进一步上涨。【原文：Singapore’s small- and mid-cap stocks may be poised for further gains, supported by local market reforms, according to analysts.】
